Text: Thanks for the upload! Im downloading it right now. Unfortunately the speed turned from 500kb/s to 5kb/s when it turned 85%. Ill tell you whether it works for me as soon as Ive got it.

Hi Blackwing err, Mr/Mrs/Miss Dragon! 
Have you tried getting the latest graphics drivers for your card ?  and checking theres no conflict with the soundcard? Check out the official help/trouble shooting pages here -----> http://www.telltalegames.com/forums/archive/index.php/f-25.html

...-_-.
I doubt my drivers have anything to do with it either. I finished Episode 2 3 days before I got this one and nothing happened in-between.
same problem here, black screen after the telltale logo. and my drivers aren't to blame, ep 2 ran perfectly fine a couple of days ago.

I figured it out. I deleted this torrent and got a "similar" one that might have infact been the same. Anyway, I spotted 2 executable files. The one on my desktop linked to another exe file, odd enough, to maybe a "launcher".
After I set a link to the CRACKED file on my desktop, it worked.
Sad to see this game tho. Short, far shorter than the other two.Plus episode 1's memory leak is back.
